officialTitle: A Multicenter and Randomized Prospective Study for Improving the Outcome of Childhood Acute Promyeloid Leukemia
inclusionCriteria:
* Patients less than 16 years old with newly diagnosed PML-RARa positive acute promyelocytic leukemia.
* Must have maximum age of 16 Years
exclusionCriteria: * Patients who have coma, convulsion or paralysis due to intracranial hemorrhage or central nervous system leukemia at diagnosis.
